snippet.title: Manas - NEW Student Game Premiering @USC Games 2023 Expo Spotlight Show Wed 5/10 at 4PM PDT!
snippet.description:
Manas is an action-adventure game set in medieval Central Asia that immerses you in a land of mountains, valleys, and nomadic culture. Inspired by the Kyrgyz epic of the legendary hero, Manas, you'll defend your village against ruthless invaders with the aid of your faithful steed, Akkula. 

Through engaging visuals and innovative mounted combat, witness the beginning of Manas' epic journey!

Check it and another 60+ games out at the USC Games Expo Advanced Games Projects Spotlight Show, Wednesday 5/10/23 @ 4PM PDT - streaming LIVE on IGN and at uscgamesexpo.com, brought to you in partnership with HoYoverse!

#USCGamesExpo
